Name: Turoa
Description: Ski slopes for all abilities on the side of Mount Ruapehu, the highest mountain on the North Island.

Name: Mt Hutt
Description: Snow-capped 7,185-foot peak & top winter sports resort with lifts, jumps & runs for all abilities.

Name: The Remarkables
Description: Offering hiking & skiing at 7 parks, this snowcapped mountain range runs north to south

Name: Coronet Peak
Description: Spectacular roller coaster terrain makes Coronet Peak ski area one of New Zealand's most exciting ski resort destinations.

Name: Cardrona
Description: The ski field of Cardrona Alpine Resort ranges from 1,260m to 1,860m. The distribution of slopes is 25% beginner, 25% intermediate, 30% advanced and 20% expert.
